M&A Advisory Services

Our M&A expertise comes from both the sell and buy side and working with both strategic and financial buyers.

• Representing sellers of closely-held companies
• Recapitalizing businesses
• Targeted Strategic Acquisition Searches
• Industry roll-ups
• Divestitures


Learn More

Exit Strategy Services

Successful businesses start with a sound Business Plan and grow with Strategic Planning. Yet most business owners don’t have a formal Exit Strategy. Exiting a business is complicated and involves issues and challenges that vary greatly from those associated with operating the business. Each business is unique! Durant Business Advisors recognizes that fact. Accordingly, we will develop a tailored proposal for your business.

Learn More

We provide advisory services to company management and Board of Directors.

• Strategic Planning
• Organizational Structuring
• Financial Restructuring
• Market Expansion
• Management Coaching
• Interim Executive

Security Industry

The Physical Security Industry remains robust and dynamic. Armed with decades of industry experience, we are uniquely qualified to help you face the challenges and seize the opportunities of this vibrant industry. Strong market demand in our increasingly competitive industry is still driving annual growth in excess of 10%. The security industry has outgrown GDP for decades running, but is changing rapidly. Ensure that you have the right team working for your security business.


Learn More

Who We Are

A boutique consulting firm with a national focus and vast network of affiliates. With deep expertise in the Physical Security industry, we have the operational, legal and financial acumen to solve business problems in a variety of technology driven industries. Experience ranges from the Automotive Industry to Consumer Electronics and from Municipal Waste to the Defense industry.

What We Do

Durant Business Advisors provides advisory services to company management and Board of Directors, specializing in mergers and acquisitions, divestitures, financial restructuring, private equity capital placement, conflict resolution, operational structuring, strategic planning, and market expansion.
